snippet: Ministers in various denominations help passengers in dire straits financially and anyone in need of a spiritual lift at the airport.
abstract: Airport chaplains across the country are providing spiritual, logistical and even financial support for troubled travelers as flight delays worsen and nerves fray; chaplains still offer religious services, but are dedicating more time to solving earthly problems for those in need, often acting as a mediator between passengers and airlines.
lead_paragraph: Ministers in various denominations help passengers in dire straits financially and anyone in need of a spiritual lift at the airport.

headline.main: The Airport Chaplain, Now Offering Earthly Aid
headline.print_headline: The Airport Chaplain, Now Offering Earthly Aid

keywords.value: International Association of Civil Aviation Chaplains
keywords.name: organizations
